Description: Mould-made pottery lamp decorated on the discus with Eros in a two-goat chariot on a panelled plinth. The angular shoulder is decorated with impressed ovules. At the rear is an unpierced Egyptian ring handle. Within the base-ring is impressed a bound triple branch. The nozzle is damaged.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2055)
